snippet.title: Spirited Thief - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Scout, loot, and escape in Spirited Thief, a tactical turn-based stealth game with a twist. Search ahead as a spirit, Trin, and grab the goods as a thief, Elaj. Just make sure you have the loot before the guards come looking! 

Spirited Thief is now available on PC.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1709870/Spirited_Thief/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/spirited_thief
Discord: https://discord.gg/TJTRCNyVqr
